sentence: In November, Shapiro, who ran unopposed in the Democratic primary, will face Republican Doug Mastriano, the Trump-backed far-right candidate who wanted to overturn the 2020 election results, whom Shapiro calls extremely dangerous.? Fox and Shapiro dive into his opponents role in the January 6 insurrection and how to message to voters who believe in the big lie.? Plus, Shapiro speaks to what he learned from Democrats campaigning mistakes in 2016, why he believes freedom is on the ballot, and his thoughts on how to win in a swing state.
author: Emily Jane Fox
title: This Is a Razor-Thin State: PA Gubernatorial Candidate Josh Shapiro on His All-Important, Closely Watched Race
